params._adapters: array of adapters to update the rewards tokens on

AdapterAdded(address,address).notice: Logs the deployment of the adapter

DEFAULT_LEVEL().notice: Sets level to `31` by default, which keeps all Divider lifecycle methods public (`issue`, `combine`, `collect`, etc), but not the `onRedeem` hook.

factoryParams().notice: params for adapters deployed with this factory

setRewardTokens(address[],address[]).notice: Replace existing reward tokens array with a new one and update adapters passed
